law.catch_line: Investment of mine subsidence insurance fund.
law.text: The administrator may invest the mine subsidence insurance fund in the same types of investments which are permitted for authorized insurers under Subtitle 7 of this chapter. All income from investments credited to the mine subsidence insurance fund shall be credited to that fund.
law.history: Created 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 437, sec. 34, effective July 15, 1986.
